text: On a regular October day, you offered me that pink shirt; at first it didnt mean that much to me. Thought once worn, it did leave a great impact on me(need to BUY it).
Fish have always been one of the things that unite us. Here's one of many shared fish pics between us. Eager to go with you fishing one day(+ dump you in the sea drowned)!
Whenever i feel low or lose hope, my refuge remains you aahra, who always exhort/reassure me and draw that smile on my face.
